articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Mexican Political Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Mexican Political Party
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico (WPM) on April 7.
					 The message said:
					
					 On the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of great Comrade Kim Il Sung, I extend the highest tribute to Comrade Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, on behalf of all the members of the WPM and on my own behalf.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the great thinker and theoretician and outstanding international elder statesman who founded the WPK and the DPRK and always led them to victory and performed great exploits in building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea all his life.
					
					 Expressing belief that the Korean people would win a great victory in all fields of defending socialism and building a thriving nation under your wise leadership and thus greet the 7th Congress of the WPK with the shining feats, we take this opportunity to wish you greater success in your noble work for leading the WPK and the DPRK to victory.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Lao Party, Lao President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Lao Party, Lao President
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Bounnhang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, and Choummaly Sayasone, president of Laos, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organization, Figures
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organization, Figures
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the Shigoku Liaison Society for Japan-Korea Friendship, the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship, the family of Sin Kanemaru, former vice-prime minister of Japan, and the curator of the Kim Jong Suk Library of Peru on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: 18th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
articles.content:
18th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The 18th Kimilsungia Festival opened here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The festival on the theme of "Kimilsungias in full bloom wishing for the eternal prosperity of the great era of Kim Jong Un" brought together at least 80 units including the armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, working people from all walks of life and school youth and children that displayed tens of thousands of potted Kimilsungias.
					
					 Displayed at the festival venue are flowers praising the great man cultivated by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), overseas Koreans, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here, foreign organizations for friendship and solidarity and individuals and members of the society for disseminating and supporting the immortal flowers.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned and officials, service personnel and working people of the units which displayed flowers of the sun.
					
					 Also present were a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun and other delegations of overseas Koreans, overseas compatriots, staff members of the Indonesian embassy here and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, in an opening address expressed belief that the festival would greatly contribute to encouraging the army and people of the DPRK in their struggle and deepening the good neighborly and friendly relations with the progressive people of the world.
					
					 Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Bambang Hiendrasto in a congratulatory speech said he deemed it a great pride and honor to participate in the opening ceremony of the festival, hoping that prosperity, happiness, cooperation and firm friendship of the peoples of the two countries would continue with Kimilsungia as a symbol.
					
					 The participants went round the festival venue presenting fantastic scenery.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Djibouti
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Djibouti
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Monday sent a congratulatory message to Ismail Omar Guelleh upon his reelection as president of the Republic of Djibouti.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the president of Djibouti greater success in his work for the country's development and prosperity.

articles.title: Conferences of City and County Committees of WPK Take Place
articles.content:
Conferences of City and County Committees of WPK Take Place
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Conferences of the city and county committees of the Workers' Party of Korea took place in the run-up to the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They were attended by delegates elected by the party organizations at all levels including enterprises and cooperative farms belonging to the relevant party committees.
					
					 The participants of the conferences paid silent tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conferences discussed the work done by the city and county party committees.
					
					 They discussed and decided on the tasks for dynamically pushing  forward the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and bringing earlier the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation by consolidating the party organizations and fully displaying their militant might as required by the developing reality when the revolutionary cause of Juche has entered the phase of a leap forward on the basis of the successes and experience gained in the past work.
					
					 They reviewed the work of the city and county party auditing commissions.
					
					 The elections of the leadership bodies of the city and county party committees and elections of delegates to the provincial party conferences took place there.
					
					 Officials and party members of merits were chosen as delegates to the provincial party conferences.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on Wednesday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly; Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries; Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were Cuban Vice-Minister of Culture Carvajal Perez Kenelma on a visit to the DPRK and Cuban embassy officials.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said Kim Il Sung was the distinguished strategist and great master of idea and theory.
					
					 The fraternal relations forged by Comrade Kim Il Sung together with Comrade Fidel Castro will be a symbol of the ever-lasting friendship between the two countries, he said.
					
					 He noted that the revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Il Sung would be immortal, hoping that the Korean people would win victory in all struggles under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said the Cuban people's significant celebration of the Day of the Sun together with the Korean people is an expression of boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who performed undying and great exploits on behalf of the country and its people, era and history, will always be remembered by the Korean people and other progressives in the world as the eternal sun of Juche, Yang noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean people will make every possible effort to boost the militant friendship and solidarity with the Cuban people true to the noble intentions of the great leaders and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Wednesday on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Palestine.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Su Yong, minister of Foreign Affairs, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and chairman of the DPRK-Palestine Friendship Association, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The Palestinian ambassador in a speech referred to the feats of President Kim Il Sung who set a revolutionary example in the national liberation struggle of the oppressed people in colonies for freedom and independence.
					
					 The people and leadership of Palestine will make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the two countries, the ambassador noted.
					
					 He wished the Korean people success in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said that Kim Il Sung is always alive in the minds of the Korean people and progressive mankind as he pioneered the Juche revolution and laid the eternal foundation for the triumphant advance of the era of independence.
					
					 The relations between the two countries are the historic and traditional ones of friendship and cooperation provided by President Kim Il Sung and former President Yasser Arafat, he noted.
					
					 He said the Korean people will as ever extend invariable support and solidarity to the just cause of the Palestinian people.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian Figure
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian Figure
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues on Wednesday.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the missions of UNDP and WHO here, the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party, the participants in the 18th Kimilsungia Festival and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes taking part in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Wednesday.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They also paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: IIJI Secretary General Here
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Here
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party arrived here Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group, Delegations of Overseas Koreans Here
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group, Delegations of Overseas Koreans Here
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo, a delegation of the Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange of Korean Nationality in Dandong City, China headed by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong, and a delegation of the Association of Old Men of Korean Nationality in Dandong City, China headed by Vice-Chairman Ri Tok Chol arrived here on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Also arriving here on the same day was a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Chairman Yun Kil Sang.

articles.title: Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Wednesday on the occasion of his birth anniversary. 
					 They looked round historic relics preserved with much care at the old home.
					
					 The chief said he was overcome with profound emotion, visiting Mangyongdae on the occasion of the Day of the Sun in which all Koreans and progressives are longing for the President.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President dedicated his all to the sacred cause for the country and the nation.
					
					 Human history knows no such great man as the President who was so concerned for the nation's destiny.  
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un who is creditably carrying forward the spirit of Mangyongdae and the bloodline of Mt. Paektu is steering the movement for Korea's reunification. 
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF, deeply cherishing the pride and fortune of being blessed with the peerlessly great men generation after generation, will carry on the dynamic struggle to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification.

articles.title: Diplomatic Corps Tours Kimilsungia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Diplomatic Corps Tours Kimilsungia Festival Venue
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic corps here toured the venue of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They looked round the festival venue giving fantastic presentation of the immortal flowers in full bloom. 
					
					 The guests made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Goes on
articles.content:
30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Goes on
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Performances of the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were given at different theatres in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
					 The State Academic Voronezh Russian Folk Choir began its performance by singing the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung". Artistes of the State Cossacks Dance Company "Stavropolye" of Russia, the State Folk Band Orchestra of Belarus and the Malaysia Fresco Harmonica Ensemble highly praised President Kim Il Sung for hewing out the era of independence and making a great contribution to carrying out the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Piano Trio of Khabarovsk Regional Philharmonic of Russia played piano trio ensemble "Fly Our Tri-color Flag of the Republic" with refined rendition, successfully representing the Korean people's ardent patriotism.
					
					 The instrumental trio ensemble of Cuba deeply impressed the audience by successfully presenting instrumental music pieces.
					
					 The Music Company of Cyprus, the State Art Troupe of Vietnam, the Flamenco Band of Spain, the Chamber Orchestra Alberic Magnard of France, the State Academic Classic Ballet Group of Russia, a Peruvian soloist, a soloist of the National Opera Theatre of Ukraine and a soloist of the Japan-Korea Society for Music and Art Interchange fully displayed their artistic talents.
					
					 A conductor of the Young Philharmonia Italian Orchestra enthusiastically conducted the orchestra "We Know Nobody but You".
					
					 The art troupe of Koreans in Japan, the art troupe of Koreans in China and the art troupe of Koreans in the U.S. gorgeously decorated the festival with songs and dances prepared with sincerity.
					
					 Russian, Mongolian, Belarusian, Vietnamese and Thai artistes presented acrobatic and juggling numbers to be acclaimed by spectators.
					
					 Performances go on.

articles.title: Successful Folk Song Contesters Give Performance
articles.content:
Successful Folk Song Contesters Give Performance
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A performance was given at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Wednesday by successful folk song contesters of members of art groups of schoolchildren's palaces and schoolchildren's halls in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Put on the stage were female solo and pangchang "Thank You, Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and female solo "Mangyongdae, Highest Pride" and other pieces.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang songs, expressing yearning for smiling Kim Il Sung who devoted his whole life to the future of the country.
					
					 Also staged were numbers dealing with the devoted efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il who made high-intensity forced marches day and night to protect the bright smile and happiness of the schoolchildren.
					
					 The performers told the audience that the care of Marshal Kim Jong Un means the care of the country and it is the society of cheerful children.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers dealing with the happy children bringing their hopes and talents into bloom under the warm care of the party.
					
					 Among the audience were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials of the youth league, officials concerned and school youth and children.

articles.title: DPRK Strives to Develop Itself into Talented Nation
articles.content:
DPRK Strives to Develop Itself into Talented Nation
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made a signal progress in further improving its higher education system to meet the needs of building a talented nation.
					 Many existing universities were reinforced and provincial universities appeared, with hundreds of disciplines integrated to suit the actual conditions.
					
					 Education science institute or room and educational faculty were set up at major universities and normal and teacher training schools.
					
					 Meanwhile, a work was conducted to put the education on a practical, comprehensive and modern basis, with advanced teaching methods invented.
					
					 Hundreds of kinds of textbooks and references were newly written, lecture rooms turned into multifunctional ones and an improvement made in the method of students' exam.
					
					 A tele-education system was established at 17 universities across the country.

articles.title: Day of Great Devotion for People
articles.content:
Day of Great Devotion for People
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime gave ceaseless field guidance to all parts of the country.
					 After accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation from Japan's colonial rule, he had made the long journey covering 578 000 km for the prosperity of the country and wellbeing of people.
					
					 It was on May 5, Juche 81 (1992) that the President had a simple breakfast on the road to Kaesong City after leaving Pyongyang early in the morning.
					
					 In the city, he went round the Koryo Museum, Manwoltae, Sonjuk Bridge, Phyochung Monuments and Mausoleum of King Wang Kon, founder of Koryo Kingdom, and gave important instructions to preserve historical relics.
					
					 In the afternoon, he visited the Kaesong Textile Mill, Pakyon Co-op Farm and other units and left for Pyongyang at around 17:00.
					
					 Back in Pyongyang, he reviewed his field guidance to Kaesong and got down to another work.
					
					 That day alone, he made a 440 kilometer-long tour of nine units, spending at least 10 hours in the outside.
					
					 It was an ordinary day for the President, but a day of great devotion to be recorded in the history of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed for National Reunification Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed for National Reunification Praised
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's idea and line on national reunification and his exploits performed for the great national unity and independent reunification serve as a strong foundation for accomplishing the cause of national reunification, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article.
					 Noting that the President was the pioneer and outstanding leader of the cause of national reunification, the article goes on:
					
					 From the very day of the country's division the President set forth scientific and realistic idea and policies for national reunification in each period and at every stage of the developing revolution and made a victorious advance in the cause of reunification.
					
					 The joint conference of representatives of political parties and public organizations in north and south Korea held in Pyongyang in April, Juche 37 (1948) on the President's personal initiative and under his guidance was the historic one for saving the destiny of the country and the nation by achieving great national unity under the banner of reunification and patriotism. 
					
					 The July 4 joint statement the keynote of which is the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity-- was adopted, making a breakthrough in improving the frozen north-south relations in the first half of the 1970s and a nationwide patriotic struggle was vigorously waged to curb and frustrate the "two Koreas" plot of the separatists under the banner of the line of one Korea. These were the brilliant fruition of the President's noble patriotism, indefatigable efforts and devotion.
					
					 The country and nation faced serious difficulties owing to the moves of the imperialist allied forces and separatists at home and abroad to stifle the DPRK in the 1990s. At that time the President made public the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation, paving a wide avenue for overcoming difficulties with the driving force of the united nation and achieving national reunification and prosperity.
					
					 The lines and policies set forth by the President in every period and at every stage of the movement for national reunification reflect his warm love for the country and the nation and his noble intention and will to surely achieve national reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 It is the greatest task of all Koreans to achieve national reunification, lifelong wishes and earnest behests of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Meet to Mark Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Meet to Mark Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
Sariwon, April 13 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea Wednesday met at the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province to mark the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meeting were officials of the union, officials concerned, agricultural workers and union members.
					
					 Led by Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the union, the participants renewed their will to invariably advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, regarding the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the only guiding idea.
					
					 They declared that they would become fortress and shield politically and ideologically protecting Marshal Kim Jong Un with their lives and make the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu prevail across the cooperative fields of the country.
					
					 They pledged to turn out as one and become human bombs and bullets in the final battle for devotedly protecting the leader and annihilating the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors working hard to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK once an order of the Marshal is issued.
					
					 All the farms, workteams and sub-workteams will unconditionally fulfill the grain production plans set forth by the party and thus win a great victory on the agricultural front, they noted.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Haeju
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Haeju
Haeju, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troup on its performance tour of local areas began its performance in Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province from Tuesday.
					 Put on the stage which opened with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu" were such colorful numbers as female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and female duet "His Humanity".
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the boundless reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un and the faith and loyalty of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to become honorable victors in the on-going general offensive.
					
					 Female solo and pangchang, the immortal masterpiece "Where Are You, Dear General?" made the audience yearn for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Tap dance "Cheerful Soldier Cook", national dance "Let's Be Proud of Our National Costumes" revved up the atmosphere of the performance.
					
					 Dance "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" represented the firm will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to annihilate the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors and surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 Among the audience were working people from all walks of life and officials in the province.

articles.title: Oratorical Contest of Workers, Trade Union Members Held
articles.content:
Oratorical Contest of Workers, Trade Union Members Held
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- An oratorical contest of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) "The great leader is the eternal sun of the workers and trade union" took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK, and its officials and members and workers.
					
					 The performers highly lauded Kim Il Sung's life of patriotic devotion, recalling that he embarked on the road of revolution in his early years and dedicated himself to the country and its people, experiencing all sorts of sufferings.
					
					 They praised the President for training the working class of the DPRK as a strong pillar supporting the country and a core unit of revolution.
					
					 They also spoke of his revolutionary faith and strong will.
					
					 They called upon all people to make a breakthrough in the day-and-night advance toward the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and put the educational conditions and circumstances on the highest level and thus positively contribute to building a power of talents.
					
					 The DPRK is sure to emerge victorious thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully translating the noble plans and desires of the great leaders into reality, they stressed.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Escalating Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Escalating Confrontation with Compatriots
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Suk, vice-chairwoman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, on Tuesday issued a statement denouncing the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for making desperate efforts to escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					 The statement noted that Park is crying out for conducting a "beheading operation" and an "operation for striking the office of the supreme leadership" of the DPRK, not content with kicking up a racket for "advancing into the inland depth of the north" and "occupying Pyongyang" after kicking off the largest-ever drills for preemptive nuclear attack against the north together with U.S. forces.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan will turn out in a nationwide sacred war to make a clean sweep of the Park group of traitors and usher in a new era of independent reunification, the statement declared.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Discrimination against Korean Schools Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Discrimination against Korean Schools Denounced
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Protest actions against the Japanese authorities' despicable discrimination against Koreans are mounting in Japan as they stage the farce of examining the issue of tuition-free program for Korean schools in Japan.
					 The Liaison Society against the exclusion of Korean schools from the list of tuition-free program for senior high schools, a Japanese civic organization, on April 11 sent protest letters to governors of prefectures of Japan.
					
					 The written protests chided the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan for sending all self-governing bodies on March 29 notices demanding "sufficient examination" of subsidies to Korean schools and "proper and transparent application of them according to their purposes".
					
					 The ministry's measure is ambiguous in its legal ground and may cause such discrimination against Korean schools as reduction of subsidies or their abolishment, it said, adding:
					
					 Such action as ignoring the historical background against which Korean schools were established and depriving Korean children of the right to receive education can never be tolerated.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges Japanese Reactionaries to Honestly Redeem Their Crime-woven Past
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges Japanese Reactionaries to Honestly Redeem Their Crime-woven Past
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Japan launched a war of aggression against Korea in 1592, committing monstrous massacres, arsons and plunder.
					 This clearly proves that Japan is the sworn enemy of the Koreans as it has a long history of aggression against Korea and inflicted unspeakable misfortune and pain on them, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Many Koreans met a grievous death at the hands of ferocious man-killers and more than 100 000 Koreans including technicians were abducted and taken away to Japan. It severely destroyed and looted material resources and valuable cultural heritages of Korea.
					
					 Many years have passed since then but the Korean people are vividly remembering the shuddering atrocities committed by the Japanese aggressors against the Koreans.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, however, do not have any guilty conscience of the hideous crimes against the Korean people in the past.
					
					 They are resorting to a sleight of hand to evade the responsibility to redeem their past crimes while openly denying the hideous crimes against humanity by enforcing a colonial rule over Korea after illegally occupying it in the past century, to say nothing of the crimes they perpetrated centuries ago.
					
					 History can never be written off nor be distorted.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better honestly acknowledge the crimes Japan has committed against the Korean nation, teach the young Japanese in such a way as not to reinvade Korea and settle all the past crimes.

articles.title: Newspapers Accuse Traitor Park Geun Hye of Her Disgraceful Behavior
articles.content:
Newspapers Accuse Traitor Park Geun Hye of Her Disgraceful Behavior
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Wednesday in commentaries denounce Park Geun Hye of south Korea for disclosing once again her despicable colors as a wicked traitor who put the nation to shame while relying on outside forces. They say:
					 She resorted to vicious and base solicitation in a bid to turn the recent "Nuclear Security Summit" held in the U.S. into a platform for slinging mud at the north. This was a despicable behavior of a halfwit who does not know what is the dignity and self-respect of the nation. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says in this regard:
					
					 Everyone cannot but feel resentful and deplore the disgusting and shameful solicitation diplomacy she conducted.
					
					 What she did once again laid bare her treachery of betraying the nation's dignity and interests, obsessed with sycophancy and treacherous acts. 
					
					 It is quite natural for crazy old woman Park Geun Hye to have earned an ill-fame of pro-American parrot as she took issue with the DPRK's nukes, the wealth common to the nation, though she kept mum about the U.S., the only nuclear war criminal state in the world and the biggest nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Minju Joson says Park's disgraceful behavior in the U.S. proved that she is no more than its running dog making the last-ditch effort at the death's bed.

articles.title: S. Korean Attempts to Commit Self-immolation
articles.content:
S. Korean Attempts to Commit Self-immolation
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A south Korean inhabitant attempted to commit self-immolation on April 7 in protest against the unpopular healthcare system outside an ophthalmic hospital in Songnam City, Kyonggi Province, according to the south Korean CBS.

articles.title: S. Korean Politicians Blamed for Creating "Discord in South"
articles.content:
S. Korean Politicians Blamed for Creating "Discord in South"
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A report was opened to public in south Korea recently that the south Korean politicians are to blame for "creating discord in the south".
					 The report was worked out by an organ of Yonsei University at the request of the puppet Preparatory Committee for Unification.
					
					 According to the results of the opinion poll, 82.4 percent of the respondents said "discord in the south" is getting serious, the report said, accusing the authorities and politicians of using it for their political purpose.
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presents itself, the south Korean puppet conservative group has claimed that the north is creating "security uneasiness" and "discord in the south".

articles.title: Max Thunder Drills Projected by U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
Max Thunder Drills Projected by U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet air force are scheming to stage 15-day long Max Thunder drills targeting the DPRK in the sky above south Korea from mid-April.
					 They are also mulling staging drills simulating naval attacks on core facilities of the DPRK including its nuclear and rocket bases.
					
					 To this end, a Los Angeles-class nuclear-powered submarine carrying Tomahawk cruise missiles entered Jinhae of south Korea on April 6.
					
					 On April 11 the U.S. forces and south Korean puppet navy staged what they called maneuver to cope with a maritime disaster in the waters off Jinhae.
					
					 It was reported that it would last until April 21, the main purpose of which would be diving drill and drill for clearing underwater and ground obstacles.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Meet
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Meet
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a meeting in Los Angeles, the U.S. on April 9 on the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Hyon Hwan, director of the Institute of Independent Ideology in Americas, delivered a lecture.
					
					 He said the President founded the Songun idea in his early years and led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 The Songun idea has been enriched with its validity and vitality fully proven in the practices of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence against imperialism, he said.
					
					 He added that the north is now making a breach in the old unfair international order while admonishing the U.S. arbitrary practices and irresponsibility of big powers and countering the armed forces in kind. 
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The north could emerge victorious despite all kinds of aggression moves by the U.S. imperialists, root cause of all evils and misfortune, as it was led by President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, who carried forward the Songun idea of the President.
					
					 Songun Korea is indeed a power of justice which would guarantee the world peace and security on behalf of human conscience and desire.
					
					 The DPRK will play a pivotal role in making the world independent, equal and peaceful based on universal justice and genuine truth, not by high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and big powers.
					
					 Speakers said that the people of the north, rallied close around First Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Un, are full of hope and optimism, unfazed by the persistent threat of a nuclear war and sanctions by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 He called on the Koreans in the U.S. to make all efforts for the reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Nigeria
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Strengthening the Party and Enhancing Its Role Is the Basic Guarantee for the Victory of Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the N. K. Publishing House in Enugu, Nigeria.
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 5.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Bulgarian Organization on Its Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Bulgarian Organization on Its Bulletin
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association on the April issue of its bulletin.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Russia, Mongolia, Indonesia
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Russia, Mongolia, Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung were held by the Russian Nakhodka Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung), a Mongolian company, the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia and other Indonesian machine technique company on March 31 and April 1 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is chairman of the above-said preparatory committee said that Kim Il Sung was the benevolent father of the Korean people who liberated Korea and made the people the master of the country. 
					
					 The general president of the Mongolian company said that Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea, is alive in the minds of progressive mankind as the sun, and his august name is shining as the symbol of independence.
					
					 The president of the Indonesian machine technique company said that the DPRK today which stands with dignity against the U.S. and demonstrates its might as a power with which no force dare to toy would be unthinkable without Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The president of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia stressed that a lot of foreigners who met Kim Il Sung are missing and highly praising him as he was possessed of not only the rare idea and outstanding leadership ability but also noble virtues attracting all people.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Newspapers
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 The March 28th-April 3rd issue of the Lao newspaper Heng Ngan said in its article that the President is being lauded by progressive mankind as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 The March 31st issue of the Indian newspaper Indian and World Event in its article titled "For global independence" said that the President led the world anti-imperialist independent forces to stand in unity against the imperialist reactionary forces.
					
					 The April 1st issue of the Angolan newspaper O Pais said in its article titled "HE Kim Il Sung, eternal President of DPRK" that it is about to greet the Day of the Sun, adding he is the savior of the nation and the great leader who achieved the historic cause of national liberation and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist country by dint of the people's might.
					
					 It said that the Korean people regard it as the great honor and pride to live in the country built by them under the leadership of the great leader.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Various Countries
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Celebrations, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in South Africa, Denmark, Myanmar and Malaysia from March 23 to April 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were their works, and photos showing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK for ushering in the greatest heyday of building a thriving nation.
					
					 Screened at the film shows were Korean films "Kimilsungia" and "Songdowon International Children's Camp".
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said that Kim Il Sung's undying feats will shine along with the cause of independence steadily advancing.
					
					 The secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar noted that Kim Il Sung made great contributions to the development of the DPRK, people's happiness and the struggle for global peace and justice for which he enjoys boundless reverence by progressive mankind as the most prominent great man in the 21st century and elder statesman in the world.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in South Africa.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Senegal
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Senegal
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A Senegalese preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated with due ceremony on April 6.
					 Mamadou Diouf, general secretary of the Senegalese Federation of Autonomous Workers Unions was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: Internet Seminar Celebrates Day of Sun
articles.content:
Internet Seminar Celebrates Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- An internet seminar of the East European and Central Asian regions was held under the sponsorship of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on April 4 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 At the seminar figures of the organizations for study of the Juche idea and Songun idea in the East Europe and Central Asian regions made discussions under the titles of "The revolutionary history of Comrade Kim Il Sung is good model of serving the people", "Independent politics is original one of President Kim Il Sung", "Kimilsungism and single-minded unity of DPRK", "Role of Workers' Party of Korea in socialist Korea" and "On 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea".
					
					 The chairman of the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism and the chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Il Sung devoted his all to boosting the unity and cohesion of the party since he embarked upon the road of revolution.
					
					 The chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Il Sung's life is the one in which he devoted his all to defending the sovereignty of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Songun Revolutionary Anti-Imperialist Association of the Moldovan Group for the Study of the Juche Idea lauded Kim Il Sung for making a great contribution to the development of the Juche-oriented literature and art.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Spain
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in pamphlet by the Anfer Publishing House of Spain on April 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on Oct. 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK represents the proud road in which it has taken a responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Newspaper Introduces WPK
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Newspaper Introduces WPK
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Daily Folk of Bangladesh on April 6 carried an article related to the convening of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 It said:
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held in Pyongyang in early May.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence with a long history of victorious development thanks to the wise leadership of the WPK founded on Oct. 10, 1945. 
					
					 The WPK closely rallied all the people around the leader, pursued Songun politics in all fields to defend socialism and laid down a foundation for building a thriving nation despite hardships and difficulties unprecedented in history.
					
					 It is pushing forward the building of an economic power and a highly civilized socialist country under the leadership of First Secretary Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Monumental edifices have been built up across the country and the national power has been fully demonstrated through the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 in February following the success in H-bomb test in January.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK to be held against this background will mark a fresh historical occasion to unfold a blueprint for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 7 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, dirigente nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico.
					El remitente rinde el mas sublime homenaje a Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en nombre de todos los militantes del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico y en el suyo propio, en ocasion del 104o aniversario de natalicio del lider coreano.
					
					Senala que el Presidente Kim Il Sung, gran ideologo y teorico y prominente veterano politico internacional, fundo y condujo siempre a la victoria el PTC y la RPDC y dedico toda su vida a realizar grandes hazanas en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y la de reunificacion independiente y pacifica de Corea.
					
					Convencido de que bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano alcanzara grandes victorias en la defensa del socialismo y en todas las esferas de la construccion de un Estado prospero y acogera el VII Congreso del PTC con notables meritos, desea de todo corazon al Mariscal mayores exitos en el noble trabajo para conducir a la victoria el PTC y la RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de lideres de partido y Estado de Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de lideres de partido y Estado de Laos
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviaran en comun Bounnhang Vorachith, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, y Choummaly Sayasone, presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, con motivo del Dia del Sol.
					El embajador laosiano en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Phonekham Inthaboualy, lo entrego el dia 13 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cestos de flores de entidades y personalidades extranjeras
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cestos de flores de entidades y personalidades extranjeras
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio los cestos de flores que con motivo del Dia del Sol, le enviaran el dia 13 la Sociedad de Enlace de Shigoku para Amistad Japon-Corea, la Asociacion del Intercambio Cientifico y Pedagogico Japon-Corea, el Instituto Cultural y de Amistad Peruano-Coreano, la familia del ex vicepremier japones Sin Kanemaru, y Rita Carol Rojas Farfan, directora de la Biblioteca Kim Jong Suk del Peru.

articles.title: Inaugurado XVIII Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Inaugurado XVIII Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, quedo inaugurado en esta capital el XVIII Festival de Kimilsungias bajo el tema de "Kimilsungia en pleno florecimiento bendiciendo la eterna prosperidad de la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un". 
					Se ven decenas de miles de kimilsungias exhibidas por mas de 80 unidades incluso los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares del pais.
					
					Entre los exponentes figuran tambien el Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), los compatriotas residentes en ultramar, los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las entidades de amistad y solidaridad de varios paises, las personalidades extranjeras y los miembros de la Asociacion de Apoyo a la Divulgacion de Flores Inmortales. 
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar este miercoles en la Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia.
					
					Asistieron Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios de la rama interesada, los funcionarios, uniformados y trabajadores exponentes. 
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon, de visita en la patria para celebrar el Dia del Sol, y otras delegaciones de compatriotas e individuos coreanos residentes en ultramar, los miembros de la embajada de Indonesia en la RPDC y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					En su discurso inaugural, el presidente del Comite de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia de Corea, Kim Chang Do, expreso la conviccion de que el presente certamen estimulara la lucha heroica del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos y contribuira a estrechar las relaciones de amistad y buena vecindad con los pueblos progresistas del mundo.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra de felicitacion, el embajador indonesio en la RPDC, Bambang Hiendrasto, dijo que considera como gran honor la participacion en la ceremonia inaugural del XVIII Festival de Kimilsungias y deseo que sean eternas la prosperidad, la felicidad, la cooperacion y la solida amistad entre los pueblos de los dos paises considerando como simbolo la kimilsungia. 
					
					Los participantes recorrieron la sede del festival que forma un mundo fascinante por las flores del Sol.

articles.title: Presidente de entidad nigeriana envia cesto de flores ante estatuas de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Presidente de entidad nigeriana envia cesto de flores ante estatuas de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- Ibrahim Mantu, presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Nigeria-Corea hizo llegar un cesto de flores con motivo del Dia del Sol.
					El cesto de flores fue colocado el dia 13 ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il erguidas en la capitalina colina Mansu.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a presidente de Jibuti
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a presidente de Jibuti
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 11 un mensaje de felicitacion a Ismail Omar Guelleh, reelecto presidente de la Republica de Jibuti.
					Convencido de que se fortalezcan y se desarrollen las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises, el remitente desea al destinatario mayores exitos en su trabajo para el desarrollo y la prosperidad de este pais africano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun enumera proezas de Kim Il Sung, explorador y dirigente de causa de reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun enumera proezas de Kim Il Sung, explorador y dirigente de causa de reunificacion
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun puntualiza que la idea y la linea del Presidente Kim Il Sung en materia de la reunificacion de la patria y sus proezas por la gran unidad nacional y la reunificacion independiente del pais sirven de firme fundamento para el cumplimiento de la empresa nacional por la reintegracion territorial. 
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung es el explorador y destacado dirigente de la causa de la reunificacion de la patria, afirma el articulo y continua:
					
					Desde primeros dias de la division nacional, el lider coreano presentaba en cada periodo y etapa del desarrollo de la revolucion la idea y las orientaciones cientificas y realistas para la reunificacion de la patria y logro el avance victorioso de esta empresa nacional. 
					
					Por su iniciativa directa y direccion, fue convocada en abril del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche en Pyongyang la conferencia conjunta Norte-Sur, historica cita para lograr la gran unidad nacional bajo la bandera del patriotismo por la reunificacion y salvar el destino del pais y nacion. 
					
					En la primera mitad de la decada de 1970, se abrio la brecha en las relaciones intercoreanas en estancamiento, se aprobo la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio basada en los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria: la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional, y se dinamizo la lucha patriotica pannacional para frustrar el intento de los separatistas de fabricar "dos Coreas". Tales exitos son frutos del noble patriotismo y los incansables esfuerzos del Presidente. 
					
					En la decada de 1990 cuando la patria y la nacion tropezaban con graves dificultades debido a la campana anti-RPDC y anti-reunificacion de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas y los separatistas internos y externos, el Presidente presento el Programa de Diez Puntos de la Gran Unidad Pannacional, de modo que la nacion coreana superara las pruebas y abriera el ancho camino para la reunificacion de la patria y la prosperidad nacional con las fuerzas unidas nacionales. 
					
					Las lineas y orientaciones presentadas por el Presidente en cada periodo y etapa del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria reflejan su ardiente amor a la patria y la nacion y su noble proposito de reunificar la patria con las fuerzas unidas nacionales. 
					
					Lograr la reintegracion territorial del pais tan deseada por los grandes Lideres antecesores es la suprema tarea de la nacion coreana.
